resources.string: Quoter is a simple quotes app with minimalist design that you can use to copy, share & read aloud the quotes using on-device voice engine. Notifications can also be set to receive quotes at specified time. Please rate the app a 5⭐️if you like it!\n\nNOTE: Quoter does not collect any personal information & is free to use.
